scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && npm test" "cd frontend && npm test"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd backend && npm run lint" "cd frontend && npm run lint"
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/build
